HALF-LIFE 2: EPISODE 2 IS THE LAST INSTALLMENT FOR THE HALF-LIFE 2 STORY. IT WAS PRETTY FUN AND HONESTLY THIS SERIES WAS JUST GETTING BETTER AND BETTER. SADLY, NO HALF-LIFE 3. WILL IT EVER COME OUT?

Half-Life 2 Episode One bölümünden kaldığı yerde devam ediyor. Grafik geliştirmeleri ve küçük iyileştirmeler yapılmış genel olarak. Bu bölümde daha çok açık alanlara yer verilmiş ve daha güzel olmuş. Ayrıca araç kullanımı 2. oyuna göre biraz değişmiş ve daha iyi olmuş gibi. Hikaye olarak  yine kısa. Daha uzun olabilirmiş ama yine de güzel olmuş kendini oynatıyor. 

Hala 3. oyun çıkmadı ve HALA BEKLİYORUZ...

One of the best games ever created for any platform, period. Valve made such a solid physics-based game that it holds up solidly almost two decades later. The graphics, while dated at this point, remained ahead of their time for years after the game was released. The rock-solid physics based puzzles and gameplay are unrivaled today, with the only real contender being the physics sandbox presented by BotW. Valve took the winning gameplay loop from the original HL and just added on - more lore, more weapons, more enemies, larger maps, better character models, better AI... they took what worked and ran with it. The game is an incredible sequel in an incredible franchise.

L'histoire et vraiment passionnante est à chaque rebondissement on veut toujours en savoir plus !

J'ai globalement apprécié la seconde extension, sauf le début que j'ai trouvé un peu long à démarrer, mais sinon dans l'ensemble ce fut une super expérience !

Si vous aimez les jeux avec un univers dans le style post apocalyptique, je ne peux que vous recommander de jouer aux Half-Life, qui sont pour moi, du premier jusqu'au dernier, tous de bon jeu

Maintenant j'ai qu'une hate, c'est de jouer à Half-Life 3...

[h1] Half Life 2: EP 2 [/h1]

Half-Life 2: Episode Two to kolejny epizodzik z z serii Half Life'a, czy jest warty zagrania? 
Myślę że warto poświęcić kilka godzinek na przejście tej, jakże krótkiej giereczki, jedynie po to aby poznać dalszą część przygód Gordona Freeman'a. Sama w sobie rozgrywka się nie zmieniła, ale pojawił się nowy 
pojazd, przeciwnik, ala broń do zabijania strider'ów, postacie, i oczywiście sceneria, która w większości to tartaki, kopalnie i leśna natura. Natomiast jeśli chodzi o najciekawszy moment w epizodzie 2 to wydaje mi się, że jest to zakończenie, dlaczego tak uważam? Otóż niestety kogoś żegnamy, postać, którą już trochę znamy. Dlatego też warto zagrać i poczuć klimacik.
